channel.title: CVE Feed for Kraftplugins -- Mega Elements
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Kraftplugins -- Mega Elements

item.title: CVE-2024-49693|2024-10-24T13:23:13.988Z -- kraftplugins -- mega%20elements
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Kraftplugins Mega Elements allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Mega Elements: from n/a through 1.2.6.
